vault_gcp_auth_backend_role.description: Managing roles in an GCP auth backend in Vault

type.description: Type of GCP authentication role (either `gce` or `iam`)

project_id.description: GCP Project that the role exists within

bound_projects.description: An array of GCP project IDs. Only entities belonging to this project can authenticate under the role.

backend.description: Path to the mounted GCP auth backend

bound_service_accounts.description: GCP Service Accounts allowed to issue tokens under this role. (Note: **Required** if role is `iam`)
